id_table_1.caption: Table 1:  Sample table title
references: All tables must be centered, neat, clean and legible. Do not use hand-drawn  tables. The table number and title always appear before the table. See  Table  1 .
The formatting instructions contained in these style files are summarized in  sections  2 ,  3 , and  4  below.
